extendedInfo.description: BSI is the oldest bank in the canton of Ticino. Founded in 1873 in Lugano as Banca della Svizzera Italiana, today BSI is an institution that specialises in asset management and related services for private and institutional clients.The app of BSI includes the following services: â¢ BSI news (Press releases, events and market outlook); â¢ Market information (indexes, currencies and equity prices for SMI and FTSE MIB); â¢ Exchange rates applied at cashier desks in CH; â¢ BSI funds information; â¢ BSI offices locator (with maps); â¢ Extra information (contact form, videos, â¦).
